author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: Rosegarland Estate
text:
Rosegarland Estate, Rosegarland, Wellingtonbridge, Co. Wexford
LUXURY BREAK : €300 - 3 nights in a luxury 2 bedroomed house with all mod cons designed to make your stay enjoyable.
All Rosegarland’s houses have wood burning stoves, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private patio area.
Discover miles of scenic walks in the woods including a fairy village to enchant both young and old visitors. Rosegarland Estate is ideally situated at the start of the Hook Peninsula for sightseeing and is ideal for couples and families.
This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid September 1 to November 15, 2015.
www.rosegarlandestate.ie
